posts.post_content: Looking to purchase a t206 Plank, please contact me if you have one available. Thanks!

Did you read  this thread? He has one and some other Super High-End cards.
[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=254758[/url]
Apparantly the Honus Wagner sold :eek: or got pulled at 1.5 mill
Still has the Plank (missing color) for 450k
Ruth RC for 325k  and a run of Mantles with autos from 52-69 for 125k
Pick your posion :cool:
